content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for a rent of 1,500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment is indeed well-located and well-equipped. However, I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable. I am willing to rent the apartment, but I hope we can negotiate the price to make it more affordable for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand that you're a student and you might be on a tight budget. However, my apartment is in high demand due to its prime location. I am willing to negotiate, but I'm sure you understand that I want to get a fair price for my property. I can go down to 1,450 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. I really appreciate it. However, as a student, I need to save money wherever I can. I propose a rent of 1,200 Euro per month. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Yi-Nuo Wang, but 1,200 Euro per month is too low for my apartment. I have put a lot of effort into maintaining its quality and the location is prime. I can go down to 1,350 Euro per month, but I can't go any lower. I hope you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. I understand your position, and I appreciate your flexibility. I propose a rent of 1,250 Euro per month. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, 1,250 Euro per month is still not acceptable for me. My apartment is a great deal for you, considering its location and condition. I can go down to 1,300 Euro per month, but that's the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. I understand your position, and I appreciate your flexibility. I propose a rent of 1,280 Euro per month. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your persistence, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, 1,280 Euro per month is still not acceptable for me. I do want to make a deal, but I need a price that reflects the value of my apartment. I can go down to 1,290 Euro per month, but I can't go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Schmidt. I understand your position, and I appreciate your flexibility. I propose a rent of 1,290 Euro per month. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground, Yi-Nuo Wang. I agree to the price of 1,290 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1,290 Euro per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
